# attributeValues

**Instance Property**

The values of each attribute associated with the node’s attached shader.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue] { get set }
```

```swift
var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue] { get set }
```

## Discussion

All nodes have their own copy of an attribute value and therefore the attribute values can be different across the same [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKShader]. If instead you need all nodes to share the same value, use [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKUniform]. Uniforms can change values every frame, but uniforms cannot vary per-node like attributes can.

## Customizing Stroking or Fill Drawing

- **Controlling Shape Drawing with Shaders**: Change a shape node’s appearance by supplying custom shader code.
- **strokeShader**: A custom shader used to determine the color of the stroked portion of the shape node.
- **fillShader**: A custom shader used to determine the color of the filled portion of the shape node.
- **setValue(_:forAttribute:)**: Sets an attribute value for an attached shader.
- **value(forAttributeNamed:)**: The value of a shader attribute.
